title: Chop Shop
actors: Alejandro Polanco, Isamar Gonzales, Rob Sowulski, Carlos Zapata
plot: Alejandro, a resourceful street orphan on the verge of adolescence, lives and works in an auto-body repair shop in a sprawling junkyard on the outskirts of Queens, New York. In this chaotic world of adults, Alejandro struggles to make a better life for himself and his sixteen-year-old sister.
